lines: I currently work as an Embedded Software Developer for Idaho Scientific.
I primarily write low-level software which interacts with proprietary FPGA IP cores.
The boards I target often contain both an x86 and a Xilinx MPSoC.
Thus, I have experience with device drivers in both Linux and bare metal!
Almost all of my work is in C and C++.
My experience thus far at Idaho Scientific has further sparked my interest in many systems software topics.
I hope to continue to grow my knowledge of operating systems, compilers, driver development, and more as my career progresses.
